imdb.plot outline: The computer specialist Nikolay (30) helps his girlfriend Anna (26) to move into a new rented apartment. It becomes evident from the conversation that the young people are in a relationship, and Nikolay is going to move there soon as well.Having heard a strange noise at the stairs, Ivan (31) leaves the apartment and watches the new neighbors Anna and Nikolay moving in. That is how they meet. In the evening Anna and Nikolay are unpacking boxes, when Lenka runs into their apartment. Together they celebrate their housewarming. During the celebration Nikolay receives a mysterious text message: "I hope you will be wise." Nikolay goes into the bedroom full of boxes and pulls out a frame with their common picture ... Anya is touched by Nikolay's romantic gesture, they are hugging. The next morning Anna wakes up with a terrible headache. Someone persistently rings the doorbell. Anya opens the door - it's Lenka looking for her mobile. Anya trudges back to the bed, where Nikolay is lying under the blanket. She is complaining about a headache. Nikolay is not responding. Anya shakes Nikolay and pulls off the blanket. There is a knife Nikolay's chest. Anna cannot believe what has happened, accept the situation and live on. But moreover she becomes the prime suspect of the murder. Anya is heaped by blackmail, extortion and "set-ups". And her sudden defender Ivan also finds himself under the enormous pressure. Together they confront the powerful criminal structure, over and over again miraculously avoiding death. But most importantly both of them do not totally understand why they are being followed, and how to get the bandits "that mysterious something". Will they manage to get out of trouble and stay alive?. Will the police help Anya or investigators are involved in this case?. Will Ivan become more than just a bodyguard for Anna? And how to handle the information that the unfortunate mates will eventually find in a seemingly unremarkable photo frame?
imdb.title: Zhenshchina v bede
